      • searchAction

        public void searchAction()
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Given a string, it searches an element in the database. if nothing is to be found, it throws an information.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - a problem has occurred.

      • deleteAccountAction

        public void deleteAccountAction()
                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                java.sql.SQLException,
                                java.lang.InterruptedException
        Methode to delete the account of the user. it deletes: - all the entries - the derby.log file - the database folder - the c3r.c3r file this action is final. no coming back from it. only tears.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred.
        java.sql.SQLException - if a problem occurs with the DB, a exception is raised.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if a problem occurs during the process, an exception is thrown.
